SPSimpleList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_FOODBANKBATCHTX ( @BATCHTXCONTEXTID uniqueidentifier = NULL ) as set nocount on;
SELECT DISTINCT C.ID as VALUE , C.KEYNAME as LABEL FROM USR_BATCHFOODBANKTRANSACTIONADD BATCHTX INNER JOIN CONSTITUENT C on BATCHTX.PRIMARYCONTEXTRECORDID = C.ID WHERE BATCHTX.BATCHID = @BATCHTXCONTEXTID ORDER BY C.KEYNAME
